dmca.title: Copyright Infringement Claim: SD EnterNet
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal>
www.theplanet.com/legal.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


  _____  

From: Randy Dommer [mailto:rdommer@sdenternet.co.kr] 
Sent: Wednesday, February 01, 2006 7:04 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement Claim: SD EnterNet



Hello there,

 

My name is Randy Dommer, and I am currently the US Assistant Manager for SD
EnterNet. We hold the trademarks and copyrights for our MMOG title: Navy
Field. It has come to my attention that there are illegally modified
versions of our game being distributed and available at a site:
www.smedd.com <http://www.smedd.com/> . Attached is a screenshot of said
file. It goes by the name: SuperNavyFIELD.rar.  The file and information on
how to access it has been deliberately hidden from us. My company has never
authorized any such file to be made, so I ask that you please take steps to
expeditiously remove or disable access to this file. If there is any other
information that you wish for me to provide please let me know.

 

Thank you for your cooperation,

 

Randy Dommer

 

 <http://www.navyfield.com/>
